Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Hillary Clinton "accidentally" paid ISIS $400 million. There is no evidence or support provided to prove this claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or credible sources to back up the assertion that Hillary Clinton accidentally paid ISIS $400 million.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption by linking the payment made to Iran by the Obama administration to Hillary Clinton and ISIS without any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider any alternative explanations for the payment made to Iran and jumps to the conclusion that it was accidental and connected to ISIS.
